assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Maria C. Katapodi is guest editor of this special issue of Familial Cancer but was not involved in the peer-review process of the manuscript. Otherwise, the authors declare no conflict of interest. The funders had no role in the design of the study; in the collection, analyses, or interpretation of data; in the writing of the manuscript, or in the decision to publish the results.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethical review and approval were not necessary for this study, as it was a literature review of published studies.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The following are available online, Table : search strategy, Tables 2a-2d: quality assessment.
